quote: I will take responsibility for what I have done, If I must fall, I will rise each time a better man.
A person is more than their experiences, stocked up like stones... Our best moments are the foudations we use to reach for the sky.
Expectations are like fine pottery. The harder you hold them, the more likely they are to break.
attribution: Shallan Davar, The Way Of Kings

quote: We aren't limited to one way of being great.
He who would climb the ladder must begin at the bottom.
Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.
Do you need a reason to not want to lose?
વળગણ કામ નું નહિ, કાર્ય નું રાખો.
